alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 6:24AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN RAPIDES...NORTHEASTERN EVANGELINE AND AVOYELLES PARISHES THROUGH 715 AM CST... At 624 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alexandria to near Pine Prairie. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Marksville, Bunkie, Simmesport, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Bordelonville, Alexandria International Airport, Effie, Ball, Cottonport, Pine Prairie, Mansura, Lecompte, Hessmer, Evergreen, Plaucheville, and Bayou Chicot. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 43 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
